person.persName: Henry Hunt Mayo (Covington, KY, mill proprietor)

body.p: Covington, Kentucky, mill proprietor. Kentucky native. Married to Louisa Winston Mayo in Boone County, Kentucky, on September 1, 1831. Father of William Mayo, Sarah Mayo, Levina Mayo, Aurelia Mayo, Dudley Mayo, Louisa Mayo, Lynch Mayo, Henry H. Mayo, and Emma Mayo. Lumber merchant in Campbell County, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned one enslaved person in Campbell County, Kentucky, in 1850. Planing mill proprietor in Covington, Kentucky, in 1860.
